item.title: Xbox Series X|S price changes in the U.S.
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/xbox-series-price-changes-in-the-us/ -

Microsoft explains, “beginning on October 3, we will update the recommended retailer pricing for Series S and Series X consoles in the United States due to changes in the macroeconomic environment”. Microsoft also states that, “pricing in countries outside the U.S. remains the same”.

Each bundle is increasing by $50

  • Xbox Series S 512 $399.99
  • Xbox Series S 1TB $449.99
  • Xbox Series X Digital $599.99
  • Xbox Series X $649.99
  • Xbox Series X 2TB Galaxy Black Special Edition $799.99

Full details here

- http://localhost:1313/posts/xbox-series-price-changes-in-the-us/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: Battlefield 6 will not have a console-only crossplay option
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/battlefield6-will-not-have-console-only-crossplay/ -

Despite an earlier interview with a Battlefield Studios developer suggesting Battlefield 6 would include a console-only cross-play option, Dexerto reports that EA has confirmed otherwise. Instead, console players who choose to disable cross-play will be limited to matchmaking solely within their own platform.

- http://localhost:1313/posts/battlefield6-will-not-have-console-only-crossplay/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: Gamefact #2
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/gamefacts/gamefact_2/ -

The very first Grand Theft Auto launched on MS-DOS and Windows on November 28, 1997. GTA IV released on April 29, 2008â€”a span of 10 years, 5 months, and 1 day.

Today marks 12 years since the release of GTA V (September 17, 2013). In that time, Rockstar has not released another mainline GTA title. Instead, we only saw one handheld spinoff (GTA: Chinatown Wars for PSP and Nintendo DS) and two expansions for GTA IV (The Lost and Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony).

That means GTA V has now been around longer than the entire gap between GTA 1 and GTA IVâ€”a period that also included Vice City and San Andreas.

Source

- http://localhost:1313/posts/gamefacts/gamefact_2/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: Gamefact #1
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/gamefacts/gamefact_1/ -

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 released on April 24, 2025. The title launched day one on Gamepass and still secured 4.4 million copies sold in 5 months.

item.title: Dying Light: The Beast will release a day early
item.description:

item.title: Everything announced at Nintendo Direct
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/everything-announced-at-nintendo-direct/ -

Virtual Boy announced for Nintendo Switch 1 & 2

  • Virtual Boy Nintendo Classics launches February 17, 2026 via Nintendo Switch Online + Expenasion Pack Subscription with more to release over time.
  • You will need a device (cardboard model also available) to run these games.

Mortal Komabt Legacy Kollection

  • Releases on October 30, 2025 and physically on December 12, 2025.

Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream

  • Releases in Spring 2026 for Nintendo Switch.

Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade

  • Releases on Switch January 2, 2026.

Hades 2

  • Releases digitally on September 25, 2025 and physically on November 6, 2025 for Nintendo Switch 1 & 2.

Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment

  • Releases on November 6, 2025 for Switch 2.
  • Supports split screen co-op.
  • Supports Gameshare (only one person needs to own a copy).

Mario Tennis Fever

  • Releases on February 12, 2026 for Switch 2.

Super Mario Bros. Wonder: Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

  • Releases in Spring 2026.

Kirby Air Raiders gets new amiibos

  • Releases on November 20, 2025.

Yoshi And The Mysterious Book

  • Releases in Spring 2026 for Nintendo Switch 2.

The Super Mario Galaxy Movie

  • Releases in April 2026.

Super Mario Galaxy 1 & 2 Bundles

  • Releases on October 2, 2025 on Nintendo Switch.
  • New amiibo releases on April 2, 2026 (Mario and Luma & Rosalina and Lumas).

Metroid Prime 4

  • Releases on December 4, 2025 for Nintendo Switch 1 & 2.

Resident Evil 7, Vilalge & Requiem

  • All three titles release on February 27, 2026 for Nintendo Switch 2.

PokÃ©mon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimension DLC

  • PokÃ©mon Legends Z-A launches on October 16, 2025 for Nintendo Switch 1 & 2.
  • Mega Dimension has no release date.

PokÃ©mon Pokopia

  • Releases in 2026 for Nintendo Switch 2.

Donkey Kong Bananza: DK Island and Emerald Rush DLC

  • Releases today.

Fire Emblem: Fortune’s Weave

  • Releases in 2026 for Nintendo Switch 2.
- http://localhost:1313/posts/everything-announced-at-nintendo-direct/ - This is a customized copyright.

item.title: Battlefield 6 battle royale mode confirmed
item.description:
Gamefacts http://localhost:1313/posts/battlefield6-battle-royale-mode-confirmed/ -

EA has confirmed the new mode on their latest community update. It’s not clear if the mode will make it on launch, but you can play test now through Battlefield Labs. For more information on Battlefield Labs and how to sign up, visit the link below.

EA mentions some key elements that differ from other BRs,

  • 100 player battle royale with squads divided into four teams of 25.
  • Players will instantly be killed if caught by the ring.

BR Community Update

Battlefield Labs

- http://localhost:1313/posts/battlefield6-battle-royale-mode-confirmed/ - This is a customized copyright.
